channel.title: A Life Worth Living
channel.managingEditor: a-life-worth-living@solidgold.co.za (Viktor Frankl Institue of Logotherapy South Africa | Solid Gold Podcasts)
channel.copyright: © Viktor Frankl Institue of Logotherapy South Africa - all rights reserved
channel.description:
As human beings, we are essentially spiritual creatures.

We seek meaning in life, and feel complete only when we live with a sense of purpose and destiny.

Produced by https://SolidGold.co.za — #BeHeard
channel.itunes:subtitle: Logotherapy - helping people to understand and integrate meaning in their lives.
channel.itunes:author: Viktor Frankl Institue of Logotherapy South Africa | Solid Gold Podcasts

item.title: From the Heart | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:title: From the Heart | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:subtitle: Self-Transcendence is the Essence of Our Existence
item.description:
From the Heart — Self-Transcendence is the Essence of Our Existence Teria Shantall (VFISA | President) It is our self-awareness and ability to view ourselves from a distance that makes us human.


Viktor Frankl Institure for Logotherapy South Africa https://vfisa.co.za

Stay up-to-date with us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/LogotherapySA/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

item.title: Become Who You Are | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:title: Become Who You Are | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:subtitle: Your Life Has a Destination and Meaning
item.description:
Become Who You Are — Your Life Has a Destination and Meaning Teria Shantall (VFISA | President) Each life has a task to be completed, making every one of us unique and irreplaceable.


Viktor Frankl Institure for Logotherapy South Africa https://vfisa.co.za

item.title: When Life Becomes a Mission | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:title: When Life Becomes a Mission | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:subtitle: We Are Only Fully Ourselves When We Are Out There Making a Difference
item.description:
When Life Becomes a Mission — We Are Only Fully Ourselves When We Are Out There Making a Difference Teria Shantall (VFISA | President) There is such joy in living when we can be openly and confidently ourselves, and understand that we are in partnership with life.


Viktor Frankl Institure for Logotherapy South Africa https://vfisa.co.za

Stay up-to-date with us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/LogotherapySA/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

item.title: The Unconscious God | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:title: The Unconscious God | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:subtitle: There Are Wonderful Things Hidden From Us
item.description:
The Unconscious God — There Are Wonderful Things Hidden From Us Teria Shantall (VFISA | President) Life challenges us to search for its answers in an in-depth way, to gain a more profound understanding of who and why we are.


Viktor Frankl Institure for Logotherapy South Africa https://vfisa.co.za

Stay up-to-date with us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/LogotherapySA/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

item.itunes:author: Viktor Frankl Institue of Logotherapy South Africa | Solid Gold Podcasts
item.title: Living By the Dictates of Conscience | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:title: Living By the Dictates of Conscience | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:subtitle: Defining the Difference Between Conscience and the Super-Ego
item.description:
Living By the Dictates of Conscience — Defining the Difference Between Conscience and the Super-Ego Teria Shantall (VFISA | President) Conscience is an inherent part of our being. We need to realise what true conscience is and how it differs from Freud's definition of the super-ego.


Viktor Frankl Institure for Logotherapy South Africa https://vfisa.co.za

Stay up-to-date with us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/LogotherapySA/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

item.author: a-life-worth-living@solidgold.co.za (Viktor Frankl Institue of Logotherapy South Africa | Solid Gold Podcasts)
item.itunes:author: Viktor Frankl Institue of Logotherapy South Africa | Solid Gold Podcasts
item.title: A Sub-Human Existence | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:title: A Sub-Human Existence | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:subtitle: Coming Out of a State of Being Less Than Human
item.description:
A Sub-Human Existence — Coming Out of a State of Being Less Than Human Teria Shantall (VFISA | President) People can fall short of their potential, leading to a less-than human existence. Identifying and choosing to live up to our full human stature frees us to live a life of meaning and direction.


Viktor Frankl Institure for Logotherapy South Africa https://vfisa.co.za

Stay up-to-date with us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/LogotherapySA/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

item.itunes:author: Viktor Frankl Institue of Logotherapy South Africa | Solid Gold Podcasts
item.title: Death, Where Is Your Sting? | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:title: Death, Where Is Your Sting? | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:subtitle: The Meaning of Life in the Face of Pain, Guilt and Death
item.description:
Death, Where Is Your Sting? — The Meaning of Life in the Face of Pain, Guilt and Death Teria Shantall (VFISA | President) Pain, Guilt and Death or unavoidable parts of life. To find meaning in these is to find meaning in life.


Viktor Frankl Institure for Logotherapy South Africa https://vfisa.co.za

Stay up-to-date with us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/LogotherapySA/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

item.author: a-life-worth-living@solidgold.co.za (Viktor Frankl Institue of Logotherapy South Africa | Solid Gold Podcasts)
item.itunes:author: Viktor Frankl Institue of Logotherapy South Africa | Solid Gold Podcasts
item.title: Meaning in Life is Waiting to Be Found | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:title: Meaning in Life is Waiting to Be Found | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:subtitle: Meaning in Life is Discovered, Not Created By Us
item.description:
Meaning in Life is Waiting to Be Found — Meaning in Life is Discovered, Not Created By Us Teria Shantall (VFISA | President) We experience meaning by doing what life requires of us. We discuss the three sets of values that Viktor Frankl described: Creative, Experiential and Attitudinal Values.


Viktor Frankl Institure for Logotherapy South Africa https://vfisa.co.za

Stay up-to-date with us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/LogotherapySA/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

item.itunes:author: Viktor Frankl Institue of Logotherapy South Africa | Solid Gold Podcasts
item.title: A Moral Rebirth | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:title: A Moral Rebirth | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:subtitle: The Spiritual Dynamics of Repentance
item.description:
A Moral Rebirth — The Spiritual Dynamics of Repentance Teria Shantall (VFISA | President) Discover the life-changing power of an 'existential turn-about' when we take responsibility for our actions and repent of our wrong-doings.


Viktor Frankl Institure for Logotherapy South Africa https://vfisa.co.za

Stay up-to-date with us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/LogotherapySA/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

item.itunes:author: Viktor Frankl Institue of Logotherapy South Africa | Solid Gold Podcasts
item.title: Unconditional Love | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:title: Unconditional Love | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:subtitle: We Never Give up on Those We Truly Love
item.description:
Unconditional Love — We Never Give up on Those We Truly Love Teria Shantall (VFISA | President) Love is the deepest experience we can have in life. It allows forgiveness and leaves the door open for us to return home.


Viktor Frankl Institure for Logotherapy South Africa https://vfisa.co.za

Stay up-to-date with us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/LogotherapySA/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

item.title: Life is a Matter of Choice | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:title: Life is a Matter of Choice | Teria Shantall (VFISA | President)
item.itunes:subtitle: Our Lives are Determined by the Choices We Make
item.description:
Life is a Matter of Choice — Our Lives are Determined by the Choices We Make Teria Shantall (VFISA | President) talks about the life-changing impact of making responsible and morally-upstanding choices.
